name: PmaxService/getEepromItem
description: Retrieves data from the panel's EEPROM. Exact semantics are based on reverse engineering and may vary by model.

params.name: startIndex
params.description: Start index within the EEPROM to read from

params.name: maxIndex
params.description: Maximum index or number of items to attempt to read (panel-dependent)

params.name: timeoutSeconds
params.description: Timeout for the operation in seconds

schema.description: EEPROM data bytes returned by the device (may be empty if no data)
